name: HDMI Switch 3 in 1 Out, 4K@60hz HDMI Splitter, 3 Way HDMI Switcher Supports Full HDCP2.2 1080P 3D Compatible with Roku Fire TV Stick HDTV PS4/PS5 Xbox One Chromecast, Compatible with Mac/Win/Linux
short_description: 【3 In 1 Out HDMI Switch】Connect up to HDMI switch 3 in 1 out devices to a single HDMI display with this 3-in-1 HDMI switch. Effortlessly switch between devices without the hassle of plugging and unplugging cables. Enjoy seamless performance with no lag or drop in quality. HDMI Splitter 3 In 1 out Input: PC, Laptops, Xbox 360, PS3/PS4/PS5, Roku Express, Amazon Fire TV Stick, Blu-ray DVD, Game Consoles etc; 3 way hdmi splitter Output: Full HD TVs, projectors, monitors and more.

【HDMI Switch 3 in 1 Out】Compatible with most HDMI switch sources, the HDMI adapter distributes three HDMI signal to one HDMI devices so you can switch the three sources. This HDMI Switch has the key-press-switching function, you can push the button to change what port you want to use, No extra power required. A standard HDMI cable with a maximum length of 10 meters is recommended. (Note: If the overlong between the splitter and screen, please use the the extra power supply included in the product)

【Support 4k Resolution】HDMI splitter up to 4k@60hz. This 3 Ports HDMI Hub is also backward compatible with 2k, 1080p@60hz, 3840x2160p, 720p, etc. Support HDCP 2.2, HDCP 1.4, Deep Color 36bit. Support HDCP 2.2, HDCP 1.4, Deep Color 36bit. In order to make visual experience, it is recommended to set both outputs to the same resolution and refresh rate. (Note: For some input devices that run 4K@120hz like PS5 and 4K@60hz like PS4, please lower the resolution to 4K@60hz to make sure show the display.)

【Wide Compatible】The 4K Gold Plated is suitable for most devices with HDMI port, such as, Computer, XBox, PS5, Route Roku, Fire Stick, Blu-ray DVD Player, PC, projector, TV, Monitor. The splitter also support HDMI 1.4 and backward compatible with HDMI 1.3/1.2/1.1/1.0, support HDCP 2.2, HDCP 1.4, It can be widely used in entertainment and office applications to share pictures or videos (Note: Can not display 2 monitors simultaneously.)

【Easy to Use】HDMI Splitter is easy to use, you only need Plug and Play. no external driver required. No additional startup program is required, connect the monitor to “OUT” and the Three Sources to “INPUT1” ,“INPUT2”and “INPUT3” respectively. (Note: The output port does not support connecting audio).

【No Worry to Buy】The HDMI Splitter Adapter comes with 12 months after-sales service and 24 hour online technical support. If the HDMI Splitter does not work properly for you, please feel free to contact us.

name: llano HDMI 2.1 Switch 3 in 1 Out, 8K@60Hz with Remote, 4K@120Hz/240Hz, VRR, HDR10+, Dolby Atmos, CEC, 48Gbps,HDMI Switcher for PS5, Xbox, Switch, Roku, Fire Stick, Apple TV, Aluminum Alloy Case
short_description: Effortless Switching Between Three Devices:Connect up to three HDMI source devices—such as gaming consoles, streaming boxes, or laptops—to a single display. Easily switch between sources using the onboard button or the included remote control, without the need to frequently plug or unplug cables. Ideal for streamlining your entertainment or work setup.

Enhanced Chipset for Superior Signal Stability:Equipped with an advanced HDMI 2.1 signal amplification chipset, this llano switch ensures consistent and reliable signal transmission, even when used with extended-length or lower-grade HDMI cables. It effectively minimizes screen flickering and signal degradation, delivering seamless performance and broad cable compatibility.

Supports Stunning 8K@60Hz Resolution:This llano hdmi 2.1 switch is built for the future, fully supporting 8K@60Hz ultra HD video through the latest HDMI 2.1 standard and 48Gbps bandwidth. Enjoy razor-sharp details, vibrant colors, and a truly immersive experience.

4K@240Hz High Refresh Rate with VRR:Supports up to 4K@240Hz refresh rate and Variable Refresh Rate (VRR) technology, delivering ultra-smooth, tear-free visuals for high-end gaming and fast-paced content. Whether you're in a competitive match or enjoying action-packed movies, enjoy a stutter-free and immersive experience.

Three Practical Switching Methods:The llano HDMI 2.1 switch offers three user-friendly input switching options. It supports automatic switching by detecting the most recently connected source, remote-controlled switching for added convenience, and manual switching via the onboard button. These flexible control methods allow you to easily manage multiple devices based on your preferences and setup.

Recommended Cable Length for Optimal Signal Integrity:For optimal performance at resolutions such as 4K@120Hz, 4K@240Hz, and 8K@60Hz, it is recommended that the total HDMI cable length (input + output) not exceed 20 ft (approximately 6 meters). Adhering to this guideline helps maintain stable signal transmission and consistent image quality.
